mapper.select:
select Count(CNS_TB.cns_seq) from CNS_TB inner join JOB_TB on CNS_TB.CNS_SEQ = JOB_TB.CNS_SEQ left join CMPY_TB on JOB_TB.CMPY_SEQ = CMPY_TB.CMPY_SEQ left join CMPY_MNG_TB on JOB_TB.CMPY_MNG_SEQ = CMPY_MNG_TB.CMPY_MNG_SEQ and CMPY_MNG_TB.STATE != 'D' where 1=1
and ifnull(CMPY_TB.CMPY_CODE,'9999') = #{item.searchWord}
and ifnull(FN_MEM_NAME(CNS_TB.INS_MEM_ID), '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and PRDCT_NAME like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and CRTFC_TYPE like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and IFNULL(CMPY_TB.CMPY_NAME, JOB_TB.CMPY_NAME) like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(IFNULL(CMPY_TB.CMPY_PHONE, JOB_TB.CMPY_PHONE)) like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(IFNULL(CMPY_MNG_TB.PHONE, JOB_TB.MNG_PHONE)) like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and date_format(CNS_TB.ins_dt, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')

select CNS_TB.CNS_SEQ, /* 업체정보 */ ifnull((select cmpy_code from CMPY_TB where cmpy_seq = JOB_TB.CMPY_SEQ),'') cmpy_code, JOB_TB.CMPY_SEQ, JOB_TB.CMPY_MNG_SEQ,
/* 회사번호 없는 경우 */ JOB_TB.CMPY_NAME, IFNULL(FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(JOB_TB.CMPY_PHONE),'') cmpy_phone, JOB_TB.MNG_NAME, IFNULL(FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(JOB_TB.MNG_PHONE),'') mng_phone,
CNS_TB.CRTFC_TYPE, JOB_TB.PRDCT_NAME,
CNS_HIS_TB.CNS_HIS_SEQ, CNS_HIS_TB.MEMO, date_format(CNS_HIS_TB.INS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') insDtStr, CONCAT_WS('_', fn_dept_name(CNS_HIS_TB.INS_MEM_ID),fn_mem_name(CNS_HIS_TB.INS_MEM_ID)) insMem
from CNS_TB inner join JOB_TB on CNS_TB.CNS_SEQ = JOB_TB.CNS_SEQ
left join CNS_HIS_TB on CNS_TB.CNS_SEQ = CNS_HIS_TB.CNS_SEQ and CNS_HIS_TB.STATE != 'D' where CNS_TB.CNS_SEQ = #{cnsSeq} order by CNS_HIS_TB.ins_dt desc

select ifnull(CNS_TB.CNS_SEQ, 0)
from CNS_TB inner join JOB_TB on CNS_TB.CNS_SEQ = JOB_TB.CNS_SEQ
where 1=1
and JOB_TB.quo_ym = substring(#{quoId},2,4) and JOB_TB.quo_seq = substring(#{quoId},8,4)
and JOB_TB.sbk_ym = substring(#{sbkId},3,2) and JOB_TB.sbk_seq = substring(#{sbkId},7,4)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CNS_TB (CRTFC_TYPE, INS_MEM_ID, UDT_MEM_ID) VALUES (#{crtfcType}, #{insMemId}, #{udtMemId});
mapper.update: UPDATE CNS_TB SET CRTFC_TYPE = #{crtfcType}, UDT_MEM_ID = #{udtMemId}, UDT_DT = current_timestamp(), STATE = 'U' WHERE CNS_SEQ = #{cnsSeq};
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO JOB_TB ( CNS_SEQ, CMPY_SEQ, CMPY_MNG_SEQ,
CMPY_NAME, CMPY_PHONE, MNG_NAME, MNG_PHONE,
PRDCT_NAME, INS_MEM_ID, UDT_MEM_ID ) VALUES (
#{cnsSeq}, #{cmpySeq}, #{cmpyMngSeq},
#{cmpyName}, replace(#{cmpyPhone},'-',''), #{mngName}, replace(#{mngPhone},'-',''),
#{prdctName}, #{insMemId}, #{udtMemId}
)
mapper.update:
UPDATE JOB_TB SET CNS_SEQ = #{cnsSeq}, UDT_MEM_ID = #{udtMemId}, UDT_DT = now() WHERE 1=1
and JOB_TB.quo_ym = substring(#{quoId},2,4) and JOB_TB.quo_seq = substring(#{quoId},8,4)
and JOB_TB.sbk_ym = substring(#{sbkId},3,2) and JOB_TB.sbk_seq = substring(#{sbkId},7,4)
